title: AI-Powered Document Processing and Multimedia Generation Platform

objective.problem_statement: Create a comprehensive platform for document processing, semantic search, and multimedia content generation
objective.solution_approach: Develop a multi-functional backend service that can upload, process, and extract insights from documents while generating multimedia content

key_contributions: Implemented semantic document embedding using Ollama
Created dynamic Q&A extraction from PDF documents
Developed multi-service API integration (Vectara, Groq, Eleven Labs, Infinity AI)
Built scalable document retrieval and query response system
technical_challenges_solved: Automated JSON extraction from unstructured text

project_outcomes: Unified platform for document processing and multimedia generation
Semantic search capabilities across uploaded documents

metrics.scale: Support for multiple document types and multimedia generation

primary_features: PDF document upload and semantic indexing
technical_innovations: Dynamic embedding and retrieval using ChromaDB

learning_outcomes: Mastery of complex backend service orchestration
